summary: Tested Training page 3-step wizard refactor. All features working correctly: 3-step wizard (Focus, Reflect, Practice), no curriculum toggle, all step content displaying properly, legacy routes redirect to Training page, History view accessible.

3_step_wizard_loads.description: Training page loads with 3-step wizard (Focus, Reflect, Practice)
3_step_wizard_loads.evidence: Step buttons visible in step indicator: Focus, Reflect, Practice

focus_step_content.description: Focus step shows layer (Stability), pattern (Threat Blindness), pattern strength (46%), rules (2 numbered rules), example positions with arrows

no_curriculum_toggle.description: No curriculum toggle exists - pure data-driven view
no_curriculum_toggle.evidence: Searched for 'Curriculum' text - not found on page

reflect_step_content.description: Reflect step shows critical moments from last game
reflect_step_content.evidence: Shows 'Reflect on Your Moves', 'Position 1 of 6', Move 21, blunder badge (-96.7), 'You played: Qf3' vs 'Better was: Qxg4', 'What were you thinking?' textarea

practice_step_content.evidence: Shows 'Practice Position', 'Find the best move', 'Drill 1 of 3', 'Your turn - Find the best move', chess board, '1/3' navigation

step_indicator_clickable_labels.description: Step labels are clickable buttons that navigate between steps
step_indicator_clickable_labels.evidence: Clicked Focus, Reflect, Practice buttons - all navigated correctly within /training URL

step_indicator_checkmarks.evidence: On Practice step, Focus and Reflect buttons show checkmark circle icons

legacy_coach_route_redirect.evidence: Navigated to /coach - Focus step visible with all content

legacy_focus_route_redirect.evidence: Navigated to /focus - Focus step visible with all content

history_view_accessible.description: History view accessible from Training page via History button

training_button_toggles_back.description: Training button switches back from History view to Training wizard
training_button_toggles_back.evidence: In History view, Training button visible to switch back
